desc: Modest Decora provides the most stylish fireplace-inspired flame humidifier & diffusers. Create the most soothing ambiance with our aesthetically pleasing flame humidifiers. Infuse the space with the sweet aroma of essential oils. Up to 50% OFF & Free Shipping.

layout.text: Creates a gentle mist reminiscent of flames, infusing the space with the sweet aroma of pure essential oils. Benefits of a diffuser with the look of a fireplace.
